title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
review: A dystopian vision of the future.
description: A post-apocalyptic tale following a father and son's harrowing journey through a devastated America.

author: Herman Melville
review: An epic tale of obsession and revenge.
description: Captain Ahab's relentless hunt for the white whale.

review: A bleak yet beautiful story of survival.
description: A prophetic novel set in a futuristic society driven by technological control.

review: A haunting exploration of slavery's legacy.
description: Sethe is haunted by the ghost of her past.

review: A spiritual journey to discover one's destiny.
description: Santiago follows his dreams across the desert.

title: Norwegian Wood
author: Haruki Murakami
review: A poignant story of love and loss.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling depiction of a totalitarian regime.
description: Winston Smith rebels against Big Brother.

review: A moving tale of friendship and redemption.
description: Amir seeks to atone for past mistakes.

title: Slaughterhouse-Five
author: Kurt Vonnegut
review: A satirical war novel that bends time.

title: Great Expectations

review: A coming-of-age story full of surprises.
description: Pip's journey from orphan to gentleman.

title: Wuthering Heights

review: A tale of passion and revenge.

title: The Odyssey

review: Epic journey of Odysseus returning home.

title: Crime and Punishment

title: The Brothers Karamazov
